mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_NO, COUPON_NM, (DISCOUNT_PER *100), PROVIDE_DT, EXPIRE_DT, COUPON.COU_STATUS_CD, COU_STATUS_NM, MEMBER_NO FROM COUPON JOIN COUPON_STATUS ON(COUPON.COU_STATUS_CD = COUPON_STATUS.COU_STATUS_CD) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY COUPON_NO DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NM, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CD, PRODUCT_IMG_NO, PRODUCT_IMG_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_LEVEL FROM "LIKE" LEFT JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT MEMBER_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND MEMBER_SERVICE IS NULL

SELECT ORDER_NO , PURCHASE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, DISCOUNT, TOTAL_PRICE, MEMBER_NO, (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')) - TO_DATE( ENROLL_DT) ) EDT, MEMBER_NAME FROM "ORDER" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT ORD.ORDER_NO, ORD.PRODUCT_NO, PU.TOTAL_PRICE, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, ORD.MEMBER_NO, ORD.PURCHASE_NO, ORDER_OPTION, PRODUCT_NM, PU.PRODUCT_CD, REFUND_YN, PAYMENT_DT, PU.PRODUCT_CD, PAYMENT_STATUS FROM "ORDER" ORD JOIN MEMBER M ON(ORD.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO ) JOIN ORDER_OPTION OO ON(OO.ORDER_NO = ORD.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PR ON(PR.PRODUCT_NO = ORD.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN PURCHASE PU ON(PU.PURCHASE_NO = ORD.PURCHASE_NO) WHERE ORD.MEMBER_NO = 162 AND PR.PRODUCT_CD = 1
